thread.title: Concho Resources to Buy RSP Permian

author: Allison Prang
title: Concho Resources to Buy RSP Permian
text:
Concho Resources Inc. has agreed to buy RSP Permian Inc. in a deal that both firms say will make Concho the biggest drilling program in the Permian Basin.
The companies are valuing the all-stock deal at about $9.5 billion, including net debt from RSP, both firms said Wednesday. Each share of RSP common stock will translate into 0.32 shares of Concho stock, which would break out to $50.24 a share for RSP, or a 29% premium for RSP based on its closing stock price Tuesday of $38.92 a share, the companies said.
